title: Drosh Inn Website
shortDescription: A full-featured online hotel booking website
description: Developed a comprehensive hotel booking platform with user authentication, online booking, and real-time analytics. The platform supports thousands of daily transactions with 99.9% uptime.

title: Shifa Diagnostic SPA
description: Created a basic responsive single page application for the stated healthcare provider featuring appointment scheduling, video consultations, prescription management, and secure patient data handling compliant.

title: Zubi VPN
description: Built a real-time VPN application for a startup using WireGuard protocol. The app includes features like server selection, kill switch, and multi-platform support with a focus on security and speed.

title: Welcome Social Media Post for Free Library Foundation Philedelphia
shortDescription: Fully customizable social media post template
description: Designed a vibrant and engaging social media post template for the Free Library Foundation Philadelphia to promote their events and initiatives. The template is easy to customize and adapt for various campaigns.
